table.name: rate_geo_accessorial
table.description: Anticipated additional costing due to requirements of the type of shipment for that particular travel path (lane).  For example, a carrier may charge extra for handling large loads on trucks into New York City, while another may not. By anticipating these additional costs, the GC3 engine can better determine which carrier is really going to be the most economical for a specific shipment.

columns.name: ACCESSORIAL_COST_GID
columns.description: Links to the rating setup used to determine the cost of providing the accessorial.

columns.name: RATE_GEO_GID
columns.description: The GID for the rate geo.

columns.name: ACCESSORIAL_CODE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the accessorial code.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
